circumstances: Graham Jackson, a 78-year-old retiree with a passion for exploration, was reported missing after he left his job unexpectedly and was last seen at a cliff near a retirement community. After several days, police traced Graham to safety; he had wandered off-trail and become disoriented, eventually finding temporary shelter on a remote part of the island.
